body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, carpenter. Married to Mary Kelley Wayman. Father of Sarah Wayman, George Wayman, and Ann Wayman. Served in Porter’s Regiment, Kentucky Volunteer Militia during the War of 1812. Carpenter in Covington, Kenton County, in 1860.
